nodes.text: A life-form scanner, also known as a life scanner, was a form of sensor device used to detect living beings from a distance. In its Sentinel Base facility, the Galactic Empire used such scanners of Idellian Arrays make. One such system was also included on the Secutor-class Star Destroyer Conquest. Darth Vader used the vessel's scanner to prove the corvette Carrion Spike was unmanned. There also existed small, handheld models, like the one used by C-3PO on K43.
The life-form scanner was first mentioned in the 2014 novel Tarkin, which was written by James Luceno.
